Summary: I WAS TOLD THAT I WOULD HAVE A UFO EVENT BY A CHILD
divs: Sighting DetailsTHE CRAFT HOVERED OVER MY HOUSE. IT HOVERED THEN MOVED OUT SLOWLY OVER THE SKY. THEN IT SHOT OUT SUDDENLY AND DISAPEARED. I FELT HONORED TO BE ABLE TO SEE THE CRAFT.I FEEL THAT UFO'S ARE REAL.
